## Installation


    root: cva([
        "UI-HoverCard__root",
        "z-50 w-64 rounded-md border bg-[--paper] p-4 shadow-sm outline-none",
        "data-[state=open]:animate-in data-[state=closed]:animate-out data-[state=closed]:fade-out-0",
        "data-[state=open]:fade-in-0 data-[state=closed]:zoom-out-100 data-[state=open]:zoom-in-95",
        "data-[side=bottom]:slide-in-from-top-2 data-[side=left]:slide-in-from-right-2",
        "data-[side=right]:slide-in-from-left-2 data-[side=top]:slide-in-from-bottom-2",
    ]),
})`,__src__:"src/workshop/hover-card/hover-card.tsx",children:(0,r.jsxDEV)(n.code,{"data-language":"tsx","data-theme":"default",children:[(0,r.jsxDEV)(n.span,{className:"line",children:[(0,r.jsxDEV)(n.span,{style:{color:"#7ECBC7"},children:"const"},void 0,!1,{fileName:"C:\\Users\\bonfo\\Documents\\WEBAPP_PROJECTS\\chalkui\\src\\mdx\\docs\\components\\_mdx_bundler_entry_point-066039b2-e64e-4c90-9f97-ec15e80cee5f.mdx",lineNumber:1,columnNumber:106},this),(0,r.jsxDEV)(n.span,{style:{color:"#CACACA"},children:" HoverCardAnatomy = "},void 0,!1,{fileName:"C:\\Users\\bonfo\\Documents\\WEBAPP_PROJECTS\\chalkui\\src\\mdx\\docs\\components\\_mdx_bundler_entry_point-066039b2-e64e-4c90-9f97-ec15e80cee5f.mdx",lineNumber:1,columnNumber:147},this),(0,r.jsxDEV)(n.span,{style:{color:"#EBC88D"},children:"defineStyleAnatomy"},void 0,!1,{fileName:"C:\\Users\\bonfo\\Documents\\WEBAPP_PROJECTS\\chalkui\\src\\mdx\\docs\\components\\_mdx_bundler_entry_point-066039b2-e64e-4c90-9f97-ec15e80cee5f.mdx",lineNumber:1,columnNumber:203},this),(0,r.jsxDEV)(n.span,{style:{color:"#CACACA"},children:"({"},void 0,!1,{fileName:"C:\\Users\\bonfo\\Documents\\WEBAPP_PROJECTS\\chalkui\\src\\mdx\\docs\\components\\_mdx_bundler_entry_point-066039b2-e64e-4c90-9f97-ec15e80cee5f.mdx",lineNumber:1,columnNumber:257},this)]},void 0,!0,{fileName:"C:\\Users\\bonfo\\Documents\\WEBAPP_PROJECTS\\chalkui\\src\\mdx\\docs\\components\\_mdx_bundler_entry_point-066039b2-e64e-4c90-9f97-ec15e80cee5f.mdx",lineNumber:1,columnNumber:87},this),`
